name: Sir Jump-A-Lot
description:
Sir. Jump-A-Lot

Assist Sir. Jump-A-Lot in his quest of conquering the Tower Of Evil. Jump to the highest height and slay the evil lurking at every corner in this endless jumper.

Objective:
  • Go crazy jumping, jump on platforms, walls, enemies & everything you like.
  • Reach the highest height and rack up as many points as you can
    • Post your high-score in the comments!
Controls:
  • Keyboard
    • A & D  or Left & Right arrow - Move
    • W or Up arrow or Space - Jump
    • Mouse 1 (LMB) - Attack
  • Touch
    • Tilt your device left & right to move
    • Swipe to attack.
  • Buttons
    • Buttons
Features:

- High score

- Endless jumping fun
